```{r}
US_congress <- read.csv("sparse_matrix_us.csv")
DK_congress <- read.csv("sparse_matrix_denmark.csv")
```


```{r}
US_congress <- as.matrix(US_congress)
```


```{r}
 US_congress[1:5,1:6]
```

```{r}
rc <- list(rollcall(US_congress, yea=c(1), nay=(2), missing = c(0)),rollcall(US_congress, yea=c(1), nay=(2), missing = c(0)),rollcall(US_congress, yea=c(1), nay=(2), missing = c(0)),rollcall(US_congress, yea=c(1), nay=(2), missing = c(0)),rollcall(US_congress, yea=c(1), nay=(2), missing = c(0)))
```

```{r}
results <- dwnominate(rc)
```


```{r}
results_us <- wnominate(rc, polarity = c(1,1))
```
```{r}
summary(results_us)
```


```{r}
write.csv(results_us$legislators, "Nom_sim.csv")
```
